EventImageDetailActivity
This class defines the event image detail screen.
EventModel
Represents an event stored in Firestore.
LotteryGuidelinesActivity
The LotteryGuidelinesActivity class displays the event lottery participation guidelines for entrants within the SulfurEvents app.
MainActivity
Main entry point of the Sulfur Events app.
NotificationItem
Data model representing a single notification addressed to an entrant.
NotificationsActivity
NotificationsActivity presents the list of system notifications that are addressed to the currently identified entrant.
NotificationsAdapter
RecyclerView adapter responsible for displaying entrant-facing notifications such as “you were selected” and “you were not selected”.
NotificationsAdapter.NotificationActionListener
Listener used by the hosting component to react to user actions on a specific notification item (accept, decline, or view details).

OrganizerCreateEventActivity
The OrganizerCreateEventActivity class allows organizers to create new events in the SulfurEvents application.

OrganizerEvent
 
OrganizerEventsAdapter
Adapter for displaying the organizer’s events in a RecyclerView.
OrganizerEventsAdapter.MyViewHolder
ViewHolder class that holds references to the UI elements in a single event row.

OrganizerInvitedAdapter
 
OrganizerViewEventActivity
Displays detailed information about a specific event.
OrganizerWaitlistActivity
Activity that allows an Organizer to view the current waiting list for a selected event.
OrganizerWaitlistAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying entrants on an event's waiting list.
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity This activity displays the user's profile information including name, email, and phone number.
ProfileModel
This class defines a profile model for the SulfurEvents application.
UpdateProfileActivity
UpdateProfileActivity This activity allows existing users to edit their profile information.
User
User This class represents a user profile in the application.
WelcomeEntrantActivity
WelcomeEntrantActivity This activity is displayed when a new user first opens the app.
